Hi

The reason I send you this email is to invite you as a speaker at the upcoming 2014 Øredev Conference.

The conference will be held at the Slagthuset Conference Facility, in Malmö, Sweden, from November 3 to 7, 2014. We expect attendance this year to be the highest ever; in the area of 1500 delegates and 100 speakers.

Please have a look at our website www.oredev.org to find information about last years conference.

Øredev will pay for your transportation- and accommodation costs.

We would be deeply honoured to have you as a speaker.

Yours sincerely,

Pär Sikö Øredev Conference Manager per@oredev.org www.oredev.org AUTHOR: Pär Sikö AUTHOR EMAIL: per@oredev.org AUTHOR URL: http://www.oredev.org SUBJECT: [John Papa] Connect IP: 31.209.25.130 Array ( [Name] => Pär Sikö [Email] => per@oredev.org [Website] => www.oredev.org [Comment] => Hi
